name: Comic Sans Homestuck^2
description: Changes all Homestuck^2 text to comic sans for readability.
additional_info: Like the epilogues, Homestuck^2 is text heavy, which can make it difficult to process all of the text. So, I wrote a few lines of CSS to make it comic sans, which is much easier to read, like my epilogue comic sans theme. Like my epilogue comic sans theme, feel free to grab this CSS and change it around to suit your personal needs, it took me like 5 minutes to write. If this CSS makes the site display in cursive, you need to install comic sans or swap fonts.
